message:
Refactor localStorage keys to use centralized constants

- Created src/constants/storageKeys.ts with all storage key constants
- Replaced all magic string localStorage keys across 8 files:
  * AuthContext.tsx (6 instances)
  * App.tsx (multiple instances for all state management)
  * voiceApi.ts (1 instance)
  * voiceStorage.ts (6 instances)
  * calendarStorage.ts (2 instances)
  * CollectionsView.tsx (4 instances)
  * AnalysisView.tsx (2 instances)
  * EditorEngine.ts (1 instance)

Benefits:
- Single source of truth for all storage keys
- Type safety with const assertion
- Easy to refactor/rename keys
- Prevents typos in storage key names
- Better IDE autocomplete support
